explains: v. 表现出；卖弄，炫耀；提出（证据等）；展览，展出
n. 展品；（法庭上出示的）证物；<美>展览，展出

sentences.en: This exhibit was kindly loaned by the artist's family.
sentences.cn: 这件展品是艺术家的家人惠借而展出的。

sentences.en: The new exhibit will tour a dozen US cities next year.
sentences.cn: 这批新展品明年将在美国十二个城市巡回展出。

sentences.en: He had kindly offered to loan us all the plants required for the exhibit.
sentences.cn: 他友好地主动提出了借给我们展览会所需的全部植物。
